## auth.UpdateTenantRequest interface

Interface representing the properties to update on the provided tenant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UpdateTenantRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./firebase-admin.auth.updatetenantrequest.displayname.md) | string | The tenant display name. |
|  [emailSignInConfig](./firebase-admin.auth.updatetenantrequest.emailsigninconfig.md) | { enabled: boolean; passwordRequired?: boolean; } | The email sign in configuration. |
|  [multiFactorConfig](./firebase-admin.auth.updatetenantrequest.multifactorconfig.md) | [MultiFactorConfig](./firebase-admin.auth.multifactorconfig.md) | The multi-factor auth configuration to update on the tenant. |
|  [testPhoneNumbers](./firebase-admin.auth.updatetenantrequest.testphonenumbers.md) | { \[phoneNumber: string\]: string; } \| null | The updated map containing the test phone number / code pairs for the tenant. Passing null clears the previously save phone number / code pairs. |
